title: Beyond Monitoring: The Urgent Need for Strategic API Consumption Management
author: Eyal Solomon
description: As AI and API reliance soar, companies must shift from reactive oversight to proactive API management to enhance efficiency, security, and scalability.
cntitle: 超越监控：战略性 API 消耗管理的迫切需求
cndescription: 随着人工智能和 API 依赖的飙升，企业必须从被动监督转变为主动 API 管理，以提高效率、安全性和可扩展性。
